mapper.sql: id, order_no, user_id, withdrawal_type, card_number, third_order_number, amount, black_diamond, black_rmb_ratio, channel_amount, create_time, complete_time, state, flag, version
mapper.select: select count(id) from t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record where user_id = #{userId} and state = 1
select sum(amount) amount from t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record where user_id = #{userId} and state in (1,2) and create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
select count(id) from t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record where user_id = #{userId} and state = 2 and create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select id, withdrawal_type, card_number, amount, black_diamond, black_rmb_ratio, channel_amount, create_time, complete_time, state
from t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record where user_id = #{userId} and state = #{state} and create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record
order_no,
user_id,
withdrawal_type,
card_number,
third_order_number,
amount,
black_diamond,
black_rmb_ratio,
channel_amount,
complete_time,
state,
flag,
version,

mapper.update:
update t_funtime_user_account_withdrawal_record
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
withdrawal_type = #{withdrawalType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_number = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
third_order_number = #{thirdOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
black_diamond = #{blackDiamond,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
black_rmb_ratio = #{blackRmbRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
channel_amount = #{channelAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
complete_time = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
